title: God: Glory And Power For Your Destiny
description: Are you ready to unlock the power of God's Promises? This God: Glory And Power For Your Destiny book by Robert Woeger will bring you closer to God and help you live a life of joy, faith, and victory. Here is what you will receive: • A transformation of your life as you believe and apply God's Promises• Foundational Christian principles to help you live a better life• A daily devotional to help you grow in faith and revelation• A collection of powerful Bible verses for you to confess over your life• A journey to have a closer, more intimate relationship with GodThis book is a must-have for any Christian who wants to live a life of faith and power. Buy now and experience your new life that God destined for you!
author: Robert Woeger
